scripts.dev: tsc public/integration/**/*.ts --target es2016 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop true --forceConsistentCasingInFileNames true --strict true --skipLibCheck true && node-sass public/integration -o public/integration && next dev
scripts.build: tsc public/integration/**/*.ts --target es2016 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop true --forceConsistentCasingInFileNames true --strict true --skipLibCheck true && node-sass public/integration -o public/integration && next build
